name: EKReminder
desc: A class that represents a reminder in a calendar.

items.name: init(eventStore: EKEventStore)
items.desc: Creates and returns a new reminder in the given event store.

items.name: var startDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The start date of the task.

items.name: var dueDateComponents: DateComponents?
items.desc: The date by which the reminder should be completed.

items.name: var isCompleted: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value determining whether or not the reminder is marked completed.

items.name: var completionDate: Date?
items.desc: The date on which the reminder was completed.
